id.description: The unique identifier of the project.

kind.description: The type or category of the project.

show_priority_icon.description: Determines if priority icons are shown within the project.

show_priority_icon_in_all_panels.description: Specifies if priority icons are displayed in all panels of the project.

created_at.description: The date and time when the project was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the project was last updated.

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project.

name.description: The name or title of the project.

account_id.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the project.

version.description: The version or release of the project.

iteration_length.description: The duration of each iteration in the project.

current_iteration_number.description: The number assigned to the current iteration of the project.

week_start_day.description: Specifies the starting day of the week for the project.

point_scale.description: Defines the scale used for assigning points in the project.

point_scale_is_custom.description: Specifies if the point scale is custom for the project.

bugs_and_chores_are_estimatable.description: Indicates whether bugs and chores are estimatable within the project.

automatic_planning.description: Specifies if automatic planning is enabled for the project.

enable_tasks.description: Indicates if tasks are enabled within the project.

time_zone.description: The time zone setting for the project.

velocity_averaged_over.description: Specifies the method used to average velocity in the project.

number_of_done_iterations_to_show.description: The number of done iterations displayed in the project.

has_google_domain.description: Denotes if the project is associated with a Google domain.

enable_incoming_emails.description: Specifies if incoming emails are enabled for the project.

initial_velocity.description: The initial velocity set for the project.

public.description: Indicates whether the project is public or not.

atom_enabled.description: Indicates if Atom feeds are enabled for the project.

enable_following.description: Determines if following is enabled for the project.

show_story_priority.description: Denotes if story priority is shown in the project.

project_type.description: The type of project (e.g., software development, marketing, etc.).

start_time.description: The start date and time of the project.
